articles.title: Gambusia fish to check spread of dengue in Moga - The Tribune India
articles.description: To stop the spread of dengue and viral fever, the Health Department has started releasing gambusia (mosquito fish) in ponds of Moga district. Gambusia fish eat larvae of dengue-breeding mosquitoes and check the spread of the disease.
articles.content:
Tribune News Service
Kulwinder Sandhu
Moga, October 15
To stop the spread of dengue and viral fever, the Health Department has started releasing gambusia (mosquito fish) in ponds of Moga district.… [+2088 chars]
